snippet.title: Butterfly Collector (Game Trailer)
snippet.description:
Butterfly Collector is a point-and-click adventure game inspired by old school games like Myst and Bad Day on the Midway. Play as a captured human-butterfly hybrid as you work to escape your captors and repair your broken wings. Solve puzzles, talk to insects, and explore 3 areas rendered in gorgeous 90s-era 3D graphics.

Download the game here: https://valerie-paris.itch.io/butterfly-collector
